verses.verse: When <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that she <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> no <S%H7354>children,<s%> Rachel <S%H7065>envied<s%> her <S%H269>sister.<s%> She <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H3051>"Give<s%> me <S%H1121>children,<s%> or <S%H369>else<s%> I will <S%H4191>die.<s%>"

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H7354>Rachel,<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Am I in <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H4513>place,<s%> who has withheld from you the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H990>womb?<s%>"

She <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H519>"Behold,<s%> my maid <S%H1090>Bilhah.<s%> Go <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H3205>her,<s%> that she may bear on my <S%H1290>knees,<s%> and I also may obtain children by <S%H1129>her.<s%>"
She <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%> her <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> as <S%H802>wife,<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> went in to <S%H935>her.<s%>
<S%H1090>Bilhah<s%> <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> a <S%H1121>son.<s%>

<S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H430>"God<s%> has <S%H1777>judged<s%> <S%H8085>me,<s%> and has also heard my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and has <S%H5414>given<s%> me a <S%H1121>son.<s%>" Therefore <S%H7121>called<s%> she his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1835>Dan.<s%>
<S%H1090>Bilhah,<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%>'s <S%H8198>handmaid,<s%> <S%H2029>conceived<s%> <S%H3205>again,<s%> and bore <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> a <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H1121>son.<s%>

<S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "With <S%H430>mighty<s%> <S%H5319>wrestlings<s%> have I <S%H6617>wrestled<s%> with my <S%H269>sister,<s%> and have <S%H3201>prevailed.<s%>" She <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H7121>him<s%> <S%H5321>Naphtali.<s%>

When <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that she had <S%H5975>finished<s%> <S%H3205>bearing,<s%> she <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H2153>Zilpah,<s%> her <S%H8198>handmaid,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> her to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> as a <S%H802>wife.<s%>
<S%H2153>Zilpah,<s%> <S%H3812>Leah<s%>'s <S%H8198>handmaid,<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> a <S%H1121>son.<s%>
<S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1409>"How<s%> <S%H935>fortunate!<s%>" She <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H7121>him<s%> <S%H1410>Gad.<s%>
<S%H2153>Zilpah,<s%> <S%H3812>Leah<s%>'s <S%H8198>handmaid,<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> a <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H1121>son.<s%>
<S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Happy am <S%H837>I,<s%> for the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> will call me <S%H833>happy.<s%>" She <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H7121>him<s%> <S%H836>Asher.<s%>

<S%H7205>Reuben<s%> went <S%H3212>in<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat<s%> <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H1736>mandrakes<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to his <S%H517>mother,<s%> <S%H3812>Leah.<s%> Then <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3812>Leah,<s%> "Please give <S%H5414>me<s%> some of your <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H1736>mandrakes.<s%>"

She <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4592>her,<s%> "Is it a small matter that you have <S%H3947>taken<s%> away my <S%H376>husband?<s%> Would you take <S%H3947>away<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H1736>mandrakes,<s%> <S%H7354>also?<s%>" Rachel <S%H559>said,<s%> "Therefore he will <S%H7901>lie<s%> with you <S%H3915>tonight<s%> <S%H8478>for<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H1736>mandrakes.<s%>"

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from the <S%H7704>field<s%> in the <S%H6153>evening,<s%> and <S%H3812>Leah<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> and said, "You must come <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H7936>me;<s%> for I have surely <S%H7936>hired<s%> you with my <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H1736>mandrakes.<s%>" He <S%H7901>lay<s%> with her that <S%H3915>night.<s%>
<S%H430>God<s%> listened to <S%H3812>Leah,<s%> and she <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> a <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H1121>son.<s%>
Leah said, "God has given me my hire, because I gave my handmaid to my husband." She named him Issachar.
<S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H2029>conceived<s%> <S%H3205>again,<s%> and bore a <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

<S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H430>"God<s%> has <S%H2064>endowed<s%> me with a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H2065>dowry.<s%> <S%H6471>Now<s%> my <S%H376>husband<s%> will <S%H2082>live<s%> with <S%H3205>me,<s%> because I have borne him <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H1121>sons.<s%>" She <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H7121>him<s%> <S%H2074>Zebulun.<s%>
<S%H310>Afterwards,<s%> she <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H7121>her<s%> <S%H1783>Dinah.<s%>
<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel,<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to <S%H6605>her,<s%> and opened her <S%H7358>womb.<s%>
She <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H430>"God<s%> has taken <S%H622>away<s%> my <S%H2781>reproach.<s%>"
She <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H7121>him<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "May <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3254>add<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> son to <S%H1121>me.<s%>"

It <S%H7354>happened,<s%> when Rachel had <S%H3205>borne<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> that <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> "Send me <S%H7971>away,<s%> that I may <S%H3212>go<s%> to my own <S%H4725>place,<s%> and to my <S%H776>country.<s%>

<S%H5414>Give<s%> me my <S%H802>wives<s%> and my <S%H3206>children<s%> <S%H2004>for<s%> whom I have <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H3212>you,<s%> and let me go; for you <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H5656>service<s%> with which I have served <S%H5647>you.<s%>"

<S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4672>him,<s%> "If now I have found <S%H2580>favor<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> stay <S%H5172>here,<s%> for I have divined that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1288>blessed<s%> me for your <S%H1558>sake.<s%>"
He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5344>"Appoint<s%> me your <S%H7939>wages,<s%> and I will give <S%H5414>it.<s%>"
He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3045>him,<s%> "You know <S%H834>how<s%> I have <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H834>you,<s%> and how your livestock have fared with <S%H4735>me.<s%>

For it was <S%H4592>little<s%> which you had before <S%H6440>I<s%> <S%H6555>came,<s%> and it has increased to a <S%H7230>multitude.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1288>blessed<s%> you wherever I <S%H7272>turned.<s%> Now <S%H4970>when<s%> will I <S%H6213>provide<s%> for my own house <S%H1004>also?<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "What shall I give <S%H5414>you?<s%>" <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5414>"You<s%> shall not <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H6213>anything.<s%> If you will do this <S%H1697>thing<s%> for <S%H7725>me,<s%> I will again <S%H7462>feed<s%> your <S%H6629>flock<s%> and keep <S%H8104>it.<s%>

I will <S%H5674>pass<s%> through all your <S%H6629>flock<s%> <S%H3117>today,<s%> <S%H5493>removing<s%> from there every <S%H5348>speckled<s%> and <S%H2921>spotted<s%> <S%H7716>one,<s%> and every <S%H2345>black<s%> <S%H7716>one<s%> among the <S%H3775>sheep,<s%> and the <S%H2921>spotted<s%> and <S%H5348>speckled<s%> among the <S%H5795>goats.<s%> This will be my <S%H7939>hire.<s%>

So my <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> will <S%H6030>answer<s%> for me <S%H3117>hereafter,<s%> <S%H4279>when<s%> you <S%H935>come<s%> concerning my <S%H7939>hire<s%> that is before <S%H6440>you.<s%> Every <S%H3605>one<s%> that is not <S%H5348>speckled<s%> and <S%H2921>spotted<s%> among the <S%H5795>goats,<s%> and <S%H2345>black<s%> among the <S%H3775>sheep,<s%> that might be with <S%H1589>me,<s%> will be counted stolen."
<S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3863>"Behold,<s%> let it be according to your <S%H1697>word.<s%>"

That <S%H3117>day,<s%> he <S%H5493>removed<s%> the male <S%H8495>goats<s%> that were <S%H6124>streaked<s%> and <S%H2921>spotted,<s%> and all the female <S%H5795>goats<s%> that were <S%H5348>speckled<s%> and <S%H2921>spotted,<s%> every one that had <S%H3836>white<s%> in <S%H2345>it,<s%> and all the black ones among the <S%H3775>sheep,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons.<s%>

He <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>' <S%H1870>journey<s%> between himself and <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7462>fed<s%> the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban<s%>'s <S%H6629>flocks.<s%>

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> to himself <S%H4731>rods<s%> of <S%H3892>fresh<s%> <S%H3839>poplar,<s%> <S%H3869>almond,<s%> plane <S%H6196>tree,<s%> <S%H6478>peeled<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H6479>streaks<s%> in <S%H3836>them,<s%> and made the white <S%H4286>appear<s%> which was in the <S%H4731>rods.<s%>

He <S%H3322>set<s%> the <S%H4731>rods<s%> which he had <S%H6478>peeled<s%> <S%H6478>opposite<s%> the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> in the <S%H7298>gutters<s%> in <S%H4325>the<s%> <S%H8268>watering-troughs<s%> where the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8354>drink.<s%> They <S%H3179>conceived<s%> when they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8354>drink.<s%>
The <S%H6629>flocks<s%> <S%H3179>conceived<s%> before the <S%H4731>rods,<s%> and the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> <S%H3205>produced<s%> <S%H6124>streaked,<s%> <S%H5348>speckled,<s%> and <S%H2921>spotted.<s%>

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H6504>separated<s%> the <S%H3775>lambs,<s%> and <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H6440>faces<s%> of the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H6124>streaked<s%> and all the <S%H2345>black<s%> in the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban:<s%> and he <S%H7896>put<s%> his own <S%H5739>droves<s%> <S%H7896>apart,<s%> and didn't put them into <S%H3837>Laban<s%>'s <S%H6629>flock.<s%>

It <S%H7194>happened,<s%> whenever the stronger of the <S%H6629>flock<s%> <S%H3179>conceived,<s%> that <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7760>laid<s%> the <S%H4731>rods<s%> before the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock<s%> in the <S%H7298>gutters,<s%> that they might <S%H3179>conceive<s%> among the <S%H4731>rods;<s%>

but when the <S%H6629>flock<s%> were <S%H5848>feeble,<s%> he <S%H7760>didn't<s%> put them in. So the <S%H5848>feebler<s%> were <S%H3837>Laban<s%>'s, and the <S%H7194>stronger<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s.

The <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6555>increased<s%> <S%H3966>exceedingly,<s%> and had <S%H7227>large<s%> <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> female <S%H8198>servants<s%> and male <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and <S%H1581>camels<s%> and <S%H2543>donkeys.<s%>
